job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's in Computer Science, Physics, Engineering, Mathematics, or relevant analytical degree

jd: Job Description -No summaries or technology tables in the resumeResume no longer than 4 pagesRole : SENIOR Python developersLocation - Nashville, TN (Hybrid)Experience - 10yrsVisa Type - H4-EAD or OPT-EAD only no flex on visa please Any applicant with less than 5 years working in USA, the client will reject immediately.Seeking candidates who can work on-site in Newport Beach, CA (4 days a week onsite or Nashville, TN (3 days a week onsite)5 years at least in USINVESTMENT BANK EXPERIENCE, NOT RETAIL BANKSNo summaries or technology tables in the resumeResume no longer than 4 pages Excellent full stack development skills with Python and Quartz (preferred)2-Strong Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and Design Patterns skills3-Excellent problem solving and analytical skills4-Excellent attention to details5-Strong team player with excellent communication skills (written and verbal)6-Good understanding of Financial Derivatives (Swaps, Futures, …)7-Good understanding of testing concepts (TDD, BDD …)8-Possess a solid degree in Computer Science, Physics, Engineering, Mathematics, or relevant analytical degree
